mainText:
I would like to express my sincere condolences to the family.

I am an an Apple fan that has marveled at the products Steve created, which
since 2004 has become part of my daily life. This is a very sad for me
personally, knowing that Steve is no longer with us.  I always look forward
to his presentations when a new product was introduced, and looked forward
to what was coming next.

 He will be truly missed by people he never knew. Thanks Steve for Apple,
and all that it stands for.
author: Tony
